com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.api
Class OASensorManager

java.lang.Object
  com.hitlabnz.androidar.tracking.GPSInertialTracker
      com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.api.OASensorManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.hitlabnz.androidar.tracking.Tracker
public class OASensorManager
extends com.hitlabnz.androidar.tracking.GPSInertialTracker

A class that manages sensor information for tracking user's location and motion. The Sensor manager is used to monitor GPS and orientation sensors and report any changes to the respective components that are listening to it. You can add a listener to the sensor manager

Author:
Leigh Beattie

getCurrentLocation

public android.location.Location getCurrentLocation()
Get current location. This function returns filtered value. (e.g., mocked value if enabled.) Use getCurrentRawLocation() method instead to get non-filtered value.

Returns:
The current location after filtering.

getCurrentRawLocation

public android.location.Location getCurrentRawLocation()
Get current non-filtered location. This function returns raw value from the GPS sensor. (e.g. non-mocked value even if mock location is enabled.) Use getCurrentLocation() method instead to get filtered value.

Returns:
The current location before filtering.

getCurrentHeading

public float getCurrentHeading()
Get current heading

Returns:
heading in degrees (0:north / +:east / -:west)

getCurrentPitch

public float getCurrentPitch()
Get current pitch in degrees

Returns:
pitch in degrees (0:horizon / +:down / -:up)

getCurrentRoll

public float getCurrentRoll()
Get current roll in degrees

Returns:
roll in degrees (0:upright / +:clockwise / -:counter-clockwise)
